summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey and defense attorney Jeff Pagliuca regarding scheduling a call and service of a grand jury subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails discuss the pending unsealing of Jeffrey Epstein's indictment and coordination for Maxwell's testimony.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York corresponding with defense attorney Jeff Pagliuca about scheduling a call and serving a subpoena to Ghislaine Maxwell. She mentions the pending unsealing of Epstein's indictment.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney with Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C., authorized to accept service of a grand jury subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell. He coordinates scheduling with the prosecutor and requests a copy of Epstein's indictment.

persons.name: Nicole Simmons
persons.context: Copied on the email correspondence between Comey and Pagliuca, likely involved in the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual to whom a grand jury subpoena for testimony is issued, as discussed in the emails between the prosecutor and defense attorney.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. Epstein'; his indictment is under seal but anticipated to be unsealed the next day, with a presentment scheduled.

connections.description: Prosecutor and defense attorney coordinating legal matters related to Ghislaine Maxwell's subpoena and Jeffrey Epstein's case.
Pagliuca is authorized to accept service of a grand jury subpoena on behalf of Maxwell, indicating he is representing her.
Maxwell is being subpoenaed in relation to Epstein's case, indicating her involvement as an associate or co-conspirator.
Comey copies Simmons on the email, indicating they are colleagues working on the case.

events.title: Unsealing of Epstein Indictment
events.description: The indictment against Jeffrey Epstein is currently under seal but anticipated to be unsealed and made publicly available.

events.title: Presentment for Epstein
events.description: A presentment for Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled, though the exact timing is uncertain, affecting the scheduling of a call regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Call on Maxwell Subpoena
events.description: A call is planned between prosecutor Maurene Comey and defense attorney Jeff Pagliuca to discuss the grand jury subpoena issued to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena for testimony has been issued to Ghislaine Maxwell by the Southern District of New York.
Jeffrey Epstein's indictment was under seal as of July 7, 2019, with anticipation it would be unsealed the next morning.
Defense attorney Jeff Pagliuca is authorized to accept service of the subpoena on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The emails coordinate scheduling a call between the prosecution and defense, complicated by the timing of Epstein's presentment.
The correspondence reveals active legal preparations and coordination between parties shortly before Epstein's indictment became public.
